articles.author: Mary Kekatos
articles.title: Respiratory viruses increasing as Americans prepare to gather for the holidays: CDC - ABC News
articles.description: COVID and flu hospitalizations and ER visits are continuing to increase.
articles.content:
Respiratory virus season has kicked off in the United States as Americans get ready to travel to celebrate the holidays.
Flu and COVID-19 emergency department visits and hospitalizations are continu… [+3849 chars]
